description:
Frightened by coming of old age, Himiko, the Queen of Yamatai, desperately wants the life-blood of the Phoenix. Sarutahiko who won the war brings Nagi with him. He trains Nagi as a hunter for the Phoenix. Nagi, however, is planing to attack Himiko instead, while Sarutahiko is accused of such Nagi`s act. Nagi rescues Sarutahiko from the Hornet`s Cave and heads for his homeland.
Source: crunchyroll
